1.projectText: A portfolio site for Christoph Muenks to showcase his blacksmithing work. Created using Vue.js and Gridsome. Complete with custom language switcher and very simple CMS style JSON configuration files.

2.projectText: A web application for managing and tracking vinyl records. Integrated with the worldâ€™s largest physical music database. Ability to search via barcode or catalogue number.

3.projectText: A native Android application written in Java, the app allows users to upload images and share them via a unique gallery code or via a URL. Once a gallery has been shared they have the ability to view and download the images.

4.projectText: A multiplayer turn based viking shooting game.  Players spectate the opponents turn with projectile tracking/camera scrolling. Complete with animated health bars and physics.

5.projectText: A 3D rendered sequence modelled and animated using Blender. Built from scratch using a variety of modelling techniques. Animated camera sequences and dynamic materials using the node editor.

6.projectText: A single player high score based fish eating game. Built with Phaser.io and JavaScript. Animated sprites, continuously spawning enemies, watch out for those divers and sharks!
